TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Carl_Anderson, title = Carl_Anderson, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carl_Anderson} }

S.FORM: Carl Anderson sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1913 , ryax sa tay 16 nqu tay 11, Carl Anderson, squliq na p'unro. (mhuqil sa kawas tay 2001) qnxan nya Carl Anderson htagan beh sa Lynchburg,Virginia.hiya yaya yaba ga James ru Alberta Anderson. mqwas biru ga,Anderson sangka' mlaka' te babaw kayal skoki mhetay. 1965 kawas tmasoq pqwasan biru maki Lynchburg. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Carl Anderson sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, wal malaxmisoq qaniy la. kawas tay 1913 , ryax sa tay 16 nqo tay 11, Carl Anderson, sqoliq na p'onro. (mhoqil sa kawas tay 2001) qnxan nya Carl Anderson htagan beh sa Lynchborg,Virginia.hiya yaya yaba ga James ro Alberta Anderson. mqwas biro ga,Anderson sangka' mlaka' te babaw kayal skoki mhetay. 1965 kawas tmasoq pqwasan biro maki Lynchborg. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
